# status

**Instance Property**

The status of the bill.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: INPaymentStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

When performing the search, your results should contain bills whose status matches the value in this property. If the value in this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPaymentStatus/unknown], return all bills regardless of their status.

## Getting the Search Attributes

- **billPayee**: The recipient of the payment.
- **billType**: The type of the bill.
- **dueDateRange**: The range of due dates in which to search for bills.
- **paymentDateRange**: The range of payment dates in which to search for bills.
